title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.22 - Refund only on presentation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4215.22 - Refund only on presentation

State Regulations

No refunds of money paid for pari-mutuel tickets to be
made as directed by this Part shall be made except upon the presentation and
surrender of the ticket. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4215.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
